statements: SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_hash, from_address, to_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123456789';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE to_address = '0xabcdef123' AND amount < 500;
SELECT AVG(amount) AS average_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_hash, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE from_address = 'Alice' ORDER BY transaction_id;
SELECT to_address, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM blockchain_transactions GROUP BY to_address HAVING total_amount > 500 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT from_address) AS unique_addresses, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE receiver_address = '123abc'
SELECT amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM block_verifications WHERE verified_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT verification_id, verifier_address FROM block_verifications
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT sender_address, receiver_address, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address = 'Alice' AND receiver_address = 'Bob';
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE sender_address LIKE '%123%' OR receiver_address LIKE '%456%' ORDER BY sender_address ASC;

SELECT b.verification_id, b.verifier_address, bt.sender_address, bt.receiver_address, bt.amount, b.verified_at FROM block_verifications b JOIN blockchain_transactions bt ON b.block_hash = bt.transaction_hash ORDER BY b.verified_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT verification_id, verifier, verification_status FROM transaction_verification WHERE verification_status = true;
SELECT log_id, transaction_id, action_performed, action_timestamp, actor FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, to_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE to_address = '0x123456';
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount, transaction_hash, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.from_address, v.verifier, v.verification_status FROM blockchain_transactions t JOIN transaction_verification v ON t.transaction_id = v.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, username, public_key FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%'
SELECT block_id, verifier_id, verified_at FROM verifications ORDER BY verification_id ASC
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, public_key FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, sender_address, receiver_address, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM verifications WHERE verifier_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM blocks WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, from_address, to_address, amount, timestamp FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM blockchain_users WHERE user_id='c22bcf12-ebe1-4cd9-8481-6f7b790a2211';
SELECT transaction_id, audit_status FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_status='pending';
SELECT block_id, block_timestamp FROM blockchain_blocks WHERE block_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT from_address, to_address, amount FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, verifier_id, verified FROM transaction_verification WHERE verification_time > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY verification_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_audit WHERE audit_status = 'pending' AND audit_timestamp < now() - interval '1 day';
SELECT user_id, username, public_key FROM blockchain_users WHERE username LIKE '%admin%' ORDER BY username;
